All proceeds go to charity

Last year, the Barn raised $96,148.00; most of which went to local, national and global charities supported by St. Thomas' Outreach Commission.

Learn about the charities we support!

What you'll find at The Barn

< >

Cinderella

Clothing annd shoes for women, men, juniors, and children. You'll also find linens, fabric bolts, and maturnity section!

< >

Top Shop

Higher end brands (Ann Taylor, Tory Burch, Lilly Pulitzer, Polo, etc.) for women and children.

Bric-a-Brac

The place you can find absolutely ANYTHING! Dishes (fine china and every day ware), lamps, sewing and knitting items, serving trays, games, to holiday decorations, lamps, baskets, office supplies and framed art, and more!

Books

Hundreds of books from classics to sci-fi, cookbooks, travel, biography, religious, poetry, etc!

Show More!

Jewelry

An ever changing array of costume and better pieces. They also have an amazing inventory of scarves.

Furniture

Small furniture items such as dressers, end tables, small upholstered chairs, rugs and more!

Toys

Your child’s favorite place at the barn! Bikes, dolls, legos, Playmobile, games, and strollers.

Jock Shop

Find new and used sporting equipment and the best prices in town!
